audio.speaker: dancer
audio.text: I see you're at the buffet table straight away.

audio.speaker: hungry
audio.text: Yeah, I'm starving. I had a 12-hour shift, haven't eaten since breakfast.

audio.speaker: dancer
audio.text: Damn! Get some food in you!

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Hey Jimmy! You wanna join me to check out this bar after? They make killer White Russians

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: What kind of snacks do they have there?

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: They make the best sliders I've ever had

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Yeah lets go Alfonso! I've been feeling a burger lately

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Yo Jimmy I heard you crashed Taylor's car! What happened?

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Yeah... I was in a rush to get to the buffet and took a corner too fast

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Is the food that important?

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Always Alfonso. Always.

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Sorry to hear about the crash Taylor. Here, I brought you a White Russian, my favorite

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Thanks man, I need that right now. I just had the car detailed too.

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Jimmy's normally such a responsible guy.

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Now I gotta deal with insurance, ugh. *gulps drink*

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Did you hear? I just got fired.

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: No Way! What happened Taylor?

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Zoe spread some rumor that I was stealing toilet paper from the bathroom

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: I mean, they had 3 ply. I wouldn't blame you

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Hah! Shut up Alfonso

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Zoe told me you ditched her last night. What happened?

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Well, she invited me out to the bar but my guild wanted to raid so...

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: You gotta get out there more Sam

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: But the new patch just dropped!

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Hey Alfonso! Sorry I'm late

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: What took you so long Sam?

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Sorry, I just lost track of time playing Runescape

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Well come join in! The party's already started

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: You dont have to hide in the corner all night Laura

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: I know, I just hate loud music

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Here, I brought you a white russian. It's my favorite. Should warm you up

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Hah, thanks. I think i'll stay over here though and play some Splendor

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Come take your turn already Alfonso!

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Coming! I was just mixing another coctail

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: We've been waiting for you! Grab your gems before you grab another drink

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Hey I'm just trying to have a good time tonight

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: Ugh did you hear Alfonso? Sam bailed on me last night

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Aww Im sorry Zoe. Did he say why?

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: No, but I bet he's just playing more Runescape. He keeps talking about this thing called Varlamore?

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: I don't know, he makes it sound kinda fun

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: More fun than a night of drinks and salsa dancing? Impossible

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: Wow... you've gotten so good at the guitar lately

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Hah, thanks Zoe

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Jimmy! What the hell happened!

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: I'm so sorry Taylor! It was almost 10 and I had to get to Iguanas before they closed

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: You crashed my car for a burrito?

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Not just a burrito - the best burrito.

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: I'm so done with you man

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Yo Sam, the raids last night were so good!

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: I know! But could you try to mute your mic when you eat next time Jimmy?

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Oh, sorry, you could hear that?

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Uhh yeah - it was the only thing I could hear sometimes!

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Sorry I'm late Jimmy! I had to stop by the store on the way

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Hey what's up Sam! What'd you bring?

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Some garden salsa sun chips and ton of goldfish

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Oh hell yeah I'm taking those home if they dont get finished

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Hey Laura! How's it going

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Oh hi Jimmy. It's good. Just enjoying the company

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Wanna come out to IHOP with us after? We're grabbing pancakes

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Sure. I just hope its quiet there

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Jimmy I heard you crashed Taylor's car. What happened?

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Iguanas was closing and I kinda rushed over to grab a burrito on the way home

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Dude! You're smarter than that

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: I know I know... I was just really craving some al pastor

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: Did you hear? Taylor got fired for stealing toilet paper

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Uhhh... what? Stop lying Zoe. That's crazy

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: No for real! His job stocks 3 ply in the bathroom. Its so soft...

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Oh shit they got 3 ply? I might need to steal some for myself.

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Yo Zoe, me and sam are going out to get tacos after. You wanna join us?

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: Uh not if Sam's there. I'm still mad at him for ditching me last night to play some game

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Cmon, really? You're avoiding him just for that?

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: Yeah - he was gonna be my salsa partner! I had to dance with some random

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Hey whats up Laura! What're you playing tonight?

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Hey Sam! Just some splendor. I've really been enjoying it lately

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Got room for one more? I'm feeling a board game right now

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Sure hop in! We just got started

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: I heard you just built a new PC Laura, how is it?

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Dude its amazing! Got a Ryzen 7, GeForce 5090, and 64 gigs of ram!

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Sheeeeesh thats a beast! What have you played on it so far?

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Stardew valley mostly. Might load up some old flash games too.

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: Sam! where were you last night?? Weren't we supposed to go dancing?

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Yeah haha, sorry Zoe. I got caught up in some games with my clan

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: You ditched me for a fucking video game?

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: The new patch just came out! We had to check out Varlamore. I'll catch you next time I promise

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: Ugh, I'm so done with you.

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: I heard you got fired Taylor. I'm sorry man...

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Thanks Sam. Yeah it sucks. Zoe lied about me stealing toilet paper of all things

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Toilet paper? Come on thats so petty. If you're gonna lie at least make it a good one

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Well they did have 3 ply there...

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Let's go play some Brass, that'll cheer you up.

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Whats up Taylor, how you been? It's been a while

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Hey Sam! I'm good, just chillin. I finally tried out Return of the Obra Dinn

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Nice! That's one of my favorites! What'd you think?

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: It was a cool creativity toy. Super unique too! I wish more games were like that

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: Laura! Come on girl! Get up! Join me on the dance floor!

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Uhh... I'm okay over here. But thanks for the offer Zoe

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: Awww. Please? I promise its fun. I can teach you some moves!

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: I don't know, it's a bit loud tonight. I'd rather keep playing Splendor

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Hey Zoe, wanna join us for some games? Me and Sam were gonna play Splendor

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: With Sam? Hell no. That kid ditched me last night to sit at home on his computer

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Just ignore him if he bothers you that much. It'll be fun!

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: Sorry Laura, I just can't with him right now

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Taylor! Come over here! We were about to start a game and we got a seat open

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Oooo what are you playing tonight Laura?

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Brass Lancashire. It's been too long since we played!

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Wait, isnt that the one that takes like 3 hours to finish?

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Only if you're slow

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Hey Laura. Mind if I join you in the corner? Feeling kinda overwhelmed tonight

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Come on over Taylor. There's plenty of room over here. It's nice and quiet away from the music

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Ahh finally. I can relax for a minute. Work as been so hectic lately

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Tell me about it. Customers can be assholes sometimes.

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Zoe! What the hell!

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: I'm sorry!!! I'm so so so sorry Taylor! I didn't think they would actually take me seriously

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: I work at a very serious company. They take everything seriously

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: It was just a joke...
